original_text: Some of the first of your dough you shall give to the Lord as a contribution throughout your generations.
korean_text: 너희의 처음 익은 곡식 가루 떡을 대대에 여호와께 거제로 드릴지니라

sentences.original_text: Some of the first of your dough
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 반죽의 처음 것 중 일부를

sentences.original_text: you shall give to the Lord
